title: Could we get the server income in an array?

comments.author: Sorrow.7384
comments.body:
Something like this would be extremely helpful:


{"match_id":"1-1","scores":[170308,
143695,
210917],"incomes":[310, 200, 185],
...

comments.author: Sorrow.7384
comments.body:
Looking at https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/wvw/match_details.json?match_id=1-1 I donâ€™t see the income. Could you possibly provide it rather than me having to add up all the elements to create an income per server?

That would be must appreciated!
